text: Stuart Woods (January 9, 1938 â€“ July 22, 2022) was an American novelist. He was known best for his first novel Chiefs and his series of novels about the Stone Barrington character. Woods died on July 22, 2022 in Washington, Connecticut at the age of 84.Stone Barrington novelist Stuart Woods dies at 84 ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American novelists Category:Writers from Georgia (U.S. state)
